subject: Horse Racing
Belmont Stakes
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: American Pharoah, who is seeking the Triple Crown, will fly to New York on Tuesday. On Monday, Carpe Diem and The Truth or Else withdrew from the race.
snippet: American Pharoah, who is seeking the Triple Crown, will fly to New York on Tuesday. On Monday, Carpe Diem and The Truth or Else withdrew from the race.
